description: This file defines an extension method for ClaimsPrincipal objects that retrieves the user ID as a GUID, primarily by accessing specific claim types.

classes.name: HttpContextExtensions
classes.description: A static class containing extension methods for HttpContext-related objects, specifically for ClaimsPrincipal.

methods.name: GetUserId
methods.description: Extension method that extracts the user ID from claims as a GUID, defaulting to Guid.Empty if not present or invalid.
